text: Lindberg is a municipality in Regen in Bavaria in Germany in the neighbourhood of Zwiesel. == Geography == Lindberg is in the Danube Forest (Donau-Wald) region in the middle of the Bavarian Forest on the Glasstraße at the foot of the 1,315-metre-high Falkenstein, four kilometres from Zwiesel and 14 km northeast of the county town of Regen, 30 km northwest of Grafenau and 14 km from the border at Bayerisch Eisenstein. == Sights == * Höllbachgspreng ==References== Category:Regen (district)
title: Lindberg
